org.jamwiki.utils

Class WikiUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.utils.WikiUtil

  • public class WikiUtil
extends Object
    This class provides a variety of general utility methods for handling wiki-specific functionality such as retrieving topics from the URL.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • buildPagination

        public static Pagination buildPagination(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Create a pagination object based on parameters found in the current request.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        Returns:
        A Pagination object constructed from parameters found in the request object.

      • encodeForFilename

        public static String encodeForFilename(String name)
        Convert a topic name or other value into a value suitable for use as a file name. This method replaces spaces with underscores, and then URL encodes the value.
        Parameters:
        name - The value that is to be encoded for use as a file name.
        Returns:
        The encoded value.

      • findDefaultVirtualWikiUrl

        public static String findDefaultVirtualWikiUrl(String virtualWikiName)
        Determine the URL for the default virtual wiki topic, not including the application server context.

      • findTopicTypeForNamespace

        public static TopicType findTopicTypeForNamespace(Namespace namespace)
        Given a namespace name, determine the topic type.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace.
        Returns:
        The topic type that matches the namespace.

      • formatFromTemplate

        public static String formatFromTemplate(String template,
                                        Object... args)
                                 throws IOException
        Load a template file, which is a java.text.MessageFormat pattern, and parse it with the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        template - A template file path that is either absolute or relative to the classpath.
        args - Zero or more arguments to use when parsing the template.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getParameterFromRequest

        public static String getParameterFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                             String name,
                                             boolean decodeUnderlines)
        Retrieve a parameter from the servlet request. This method works around some issues encountered when retrieving non-ASCII values from URL parameters.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        name - The parameter name to be retrieved.
        decodeUnderlines - Set to true if underlines should be automatically converted to spaces.
        Returns:
        The decoded parameter value retrieved from the request.

      • getTempDirectory

        public static File getTempDirectory()
        Retrieve a file that represents a "tmp" directory within the wiki system directory. The caller should test directory.exists() to verify that the directory is available.

      • getTopicFromRequest

        public static String getTopicFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                  throws WikiException
        Retrieve a topic name from the servlet request. This method will retrieve a request parameter matching the PARAMETER_TOPIC value, and will decode it appropriately.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        Returns:
        The decoded topic name retrieved from the request.
        Throws:
        WikiException - If the topic name is invalid, such as values used in cross-site scripting attacks.

      • getTopicFromURI

        public static String getTopicFromURI(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Retrieve a topic name from the request URI. This method will retrieve the portion of the URI that follows the virtual wiki and decode it appropriately.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        Returns:
        The decoded topic name retrieved from the URI.

      • getVirtualWikiFromRequest

        public static String getVirtualWikiFromRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Retrieve a virtual wiki name from the servlet request. This method will retrieve a request parameter matching the PARAMETER_VIRTUAL_WIKI value, and will decode it appropriately.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        Returns:
        The decoded virtual wiki name retrieved from the request.

      • getVirtualWikiFromURI

        public static String getVirtualWikiFromURI(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Retrieve a virtual wiki name from the request URI. This method will retrieve the portion of the URI that immediately follows the servlet context and decode it appropriately.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        Returns:
        The decoded virtual wiki name retrieved from the URI.

      • isFirstUse

        public static boolean isFirstUse()
        Determine if the system properties file exists and has been initialized. This method is primarily used to determine whether or not to display the system setup page or not.
        Returns:
        true if the properties file has NOT been initialized, false otherwise.

      • isUpgrade

        public static boolean isUpgrade()
        Determine if the system code has been upgraded from the configured system version. Thus if the system is upgraded, this method returns true
        Returns:
        true if the system has been upgraded, false otherwise.

      • parserInstance

        public static JAMWikiParser parserInstance()
        Utility method to retrieve an instance of the current system parser.
        Returns:
        An instance of the system parser.

      • retrieveUploadFileList

        public static List retrieveUploadFileList()
        If a blacklist or whitelist of allowed file upload types is being used, retrieve the list from the properties file and return as a List object. If no such list is being used then return an empty List object.
        Returns:
        A list consisting of lowercase versions of all file extensions for the whitelist/blacklist. Entries in the list are of the form "txt", not ".txt".

      • searchEngineInstance

        public static SearchEngine searchEngineInstance()
        Utility method to retrieve an instance of the current search engine.
        Returns:
        An instance of the current search engine.

      • validateDirectory

        public static WikiMessage validateDirectory(String name)
        Verify that a directory exists and is writable.
        Parameters:
        name - The full name (including the path) for the directory being tested.
        Returns:
        A WikiMessage object containing any error encountered, otherwise null.

      • validateNamespaceName

        public static void validateNamespaceName(String name)
                                  throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a namespace name is valid for use on the Wiki, meaning that it is not empty and does not contain any invalid characters.
        Parameters:
        name - The namespace name to validate.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the user name is invalid.

      • validateRole

        public static void validateRole(Role role)
                         throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if the parameters of a Role are valid or not.
        Parameters:
        role - The Role to validate.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the role is invalid.

      • validateWikiGroup

        public static void validateWikiGroup(WikiGroup group)
                              throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if the parameters of a group are valid or not.
        Parameters:
        group - The WikiGroup to validate.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the role is invalid.

      • validatePassword

        public static void validatePassword(String password,
                                    String confirmPassword)
                             throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a password is valid for use on the wiki.
        Parameters:
        password - The password value.
        confirmPassword - Passwords must be entered twice to avoid tying errors. This field represents the confirmed password entry.
        Throws:
        WikiException

      • validateSystemSettings

        public static List<WikiMessage> validateSystemSettings(Properties props)
        Validate that vital system properties, such as database connection settings, have been specified properly.
        Parameters:
        props - The property object to validate against.
        Returns:
        A list of WikiMessage objects containing any errors encountered, or an empty list if no errors are encountered.

      • validateUserName

        public static void validateUserName(String name)
                             throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a username is valid for use on the Wiki, meaning that it is not empty and does not contain any invalid characters.
        Parameters:
        name - The username to validate.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the user name is invalid.

      • validateVirtualWikiName

        public static void validateVirtualWikiName(String virtualWikiName)
                                    throws WikiException
        Utility method for determining if a virtual wiki name is valid for use on the Wiki, meaning that it is not empty and does not contain any invalid characters.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiName - The virtual wiki name to validate.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if the user name is invalid.
